title: JRPG Orchestral Battle Music Pack
description: Orchestral Tracks for your RPG Battle and Fantasy games.
longDescription:
Suitable for JRPG or any related Fantasy RPG Game.

All tracks include a looped section, different versions, and layers.


LISTEN SAMPLES HERE


10 Unique Tracks

Unique Track Time: 23 Min. 35 Sec.

59 Total Tracks

Total time: 2 hours
